definition.featurexml: <xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><block type="feature_container" deletable="false" x="12" y="-24"><value name="feature"><block type="feature_random_patch_simple" inline="false"><field name="tries">8</field><field name="xzSpread">10</field><field name="ySpread">8</field><comment pinned="false" h="126" w="273">This block represents a block patch feature. The blocks will only generate in valid positions (for example, grass will never generate on a stone block).Patches of plants should be generated during the VEGETAL_DECORATION stage.</comment><value name="block"><block type="mcitem_allblocks"><field name="value">Blocks.CHERRY_SAPLING</field><comment pinned="false" h="80" w="160">This is the block being placed</comment></block></value><value name="condition"><block type="block_predicate_is_air"><comment pinned="false" h="81" w="310">This condition is checked for every block that is being placed. Here we don't want lily pads to replace other blocks</comment></block></value></block></value><next><block type="placement_count"><comment pinned="false" h="80" w="160">We try to generate up to 4 patches of lilypads in each chunk</comment><value name="count"><block type="int_provider_constant"><field name="value">2</field></block></value><next><block type="placement_in_square"><comment pinned="false" h="83" w="182">We then move each patch horizontally. This way they don't generate only in the corner of the chunk</comment><next><block type="placement_heightmap"><field name="heightmap">WORLD_SURFACE_WG</field><comment pinned="false" h="94" w="179">We then move the patches at the highest non-air block, so that they generate on the surface. </comment><next><block type="placement_biome_filter"><comment pinned="false" h="80" w="160">We add a biome filter, so that the patches don't generate outside of the current biome</comment><next><block type="placement_block_survival_filter"><value name="block"><block type="mcitem_allblocks"><field name="value">Blocks.CHERRY_SAPLING</field></block></value></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></xml>
